title.rendered: Alutech Aluminium And Glass’s Solar System Reaches First Quarter Running

content.rendered: Alutech Aluminium And Glass’s solar system has now been up and running for over 3 months. The 1MWp PV system installed on the facility reduced the company’s CO2 emissions by 183 metric tonnes in those 90 days, equivalent to the emissions released for a 721,000km drive or recycling 65 tonnes of waste instead of landfilling.

excerpt.rendered: Alutech Aluminium And Glass’s solar system has now been up and running for over 3 months….
